text: And all the children of Israel looked on, when the fire came down, and the glory of Jehovah was upon the house; and they bowed themselves with their faces to the ground upon the pavement, and worshipped, and gave thanks unto Jehovah, <FI>saying<Fi> , For he is good; for his lovingkindness <FI>endureth<Fi> for ever.
name: II Chronicles 7:3
